name: Fiddle-Leaf Fig Plant
description: A tall, elegant plant with broad, violin-shaped leaves. Ideal for bright indoor spaces. Adds a bold, sculptural statement to any home or office with minimal maintenance.

name: Angel Wings Begonia
description: Known for its spotted leaves and graceful form, this begonia thrives indoors. Perfect for shelves or tabletops, it blooms seasonally and enjoys moderate humidity and indirect light.

name: Echeveria Pulidonis
description: A compact succulent with blue-green rosettes edged in red. Low-maintenance and drought-tolerant, itâ€™s a beautiful addition to windowsills and rock gardens. Loves direct sunlight and minimal water.

name: Snake Green Plant
description: Tall, upright leaves with variegated green tones make this plant a hardy indoor favorite. Excellent air purifier and extremely tolerant of low light and irregular watering schedules.

name: Lucky Bamboo
description: Symbolizing luck and prosperity, Lucky Bamboo is easy to grow in water or soil. Its elegant, spiraling stalks bring peace and harmony to homes and workspaces alike.

name: Corporate Plant
description: A stylish, low-maintenance greenery option perfect for offices. It adds a professional and refreshing look to desks, lobbies, and conference rooms while improving indoor air quality.

name: Asparagus Plant
description: Feathery and lush, this plant thrives indoors with filtered light. Its soft, airy fronds add texture and freshness. Needs regular watering and appreciates a well-draining potting mix.

name: Ficus Bot Bonsai
description: A miniature tree with thick roots and glossy leaves, the Ficus Bonsai adds artistic elegance to any room. Best in bright, indirect light with consistent moisture and pruning.
